resources.string: 5GOALS encourages you to set exactly five goals for each of your day. aims to improve the efficiency of your day, to motivate you to consider what you want to achieve in short term, to decide what important is, to understand how you succeed and to increase the commitment to achieve your short-term goals.
5GOALS helps you to record these goals, to store them and to set and monitor their status.
5GOALS gives feedback about your performance through various statistics and introduces some playful inspiration through an achievement score system based on a pre-set formula.

HOW IS THE GOAL SCORE CALCULATED?
The goal score is calculated based on three factors in the last fortnight, each contributing 1/3 to the final score. The maximum score is 100.
1) The COMPLETION FACTOR is based on the ratio of your completed and set goals. (100/3 * completed goals / all goals set)
2) The GOAL COUNT FACTOR compares the goals you set to the recommended daily five goals. (100/3 * the goals you set / 70 recommended goals for fortnight)
